entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
